ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] OT: A Warning...
ygData.msgSnippet: One tidbit to add here...Mystere is the author of *both* stories, they re just written under different names, for reasons I am not aware of. He has also said
ygData.messageBody:
One tidbit to add here...Mystere is the author of *both* stories,
they're just written under different names, for reasons I am not aware
of.

He has also said that he's a happily married man with 5 wonderful,
un-abused children. The "14 seasons" reference is meant to convey
naivete and innocence, not age. His stories are not fantasies he
wishes to act out, just dark stories. The rape one was his attempt at
a backstory for a dark elven rogue that he was going to create. (On a
side note, a lot of people who write backstories for female characters
have a common thread of rape, and not just men writing them either.)
I think they went a little overboard here, especially having not
talked to the guy first.

Robynn Merrilin, Bard of E'ci

--
Katy Westerman
katy-w@...
Don't lick something unless you really mean it.
-Advice from the Naked Dancing Llama
